string-array.name: cafe_one
string-array.item: A transport cafe since 1938, and a popular hangout for rockers, bikers and petrolheads ever since.
Ace Corner, N Circular Rd, London NW10 7UD, UK

string-array.name: cafe_two
string-array.item: Coffee taken seriously in a welcoming light-filled spot with exposed girders and bench tables.
114 Tottenham Court Rd, Fitzrovia, London W1T 5AH, UK

string-array.name: cafe_three
string-array.item: Light, compact, hipster coffee-house serving sandwiches, global snacks/meals and elegant patisserie.
18 Chiltern St, Marylebone, London W1U 7QA, UK

string-array.name: cafe_four
string-array.item: Takeaway coffee, breakfasts, Asian-tinged light lunches and weekend brunch in Australian-style cafe.
13 Charlotte Pl, Fitzrovia, London W1T 1SN, UK

string-array.name: cafe_five
string-array.item: Cosy cafe with vintage-inspired decor and a terrace, for organic coffees, breakfasts and burgers.
216 St Paul's Rd, Mildmay Ward, London N1 2LL, UK
